about_the_game:
Store and display all your treasure!


Get your own house to decorate with the furniture and treasures you got from your adventures in temples and ruins! Bigger than an apartment, this standalone house allows more possibilities as well, going from a cozy cottage to a creepy mansion or cave full of gold!

You can even do all of them at the same time by upgrading your house and building additional floors to customize the way you want!

Content:

  • A big standalone house to decorate that will appear on the main hub, next to the museum.
  • The possibility to get additional floors with coins (in-game gameplay currency).
  • 10 Exclusive furniture to decorate your house and apartment including an arcade, a swimming pool, a fish tank, color spotlights and more!
